title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 761.3 - Action required upon surrender or loss of an operating certificate
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 761.3 - Action required upon surrender or loss of an operating certificate

State Regulations

An agency shall notify each patient concerned, the
patient's family and the patient's physician, at least 30 days prior to the
voluntary surrender of the operating certificate or as directed in an order of
revocation, suspension, limitation or annulment issued by the
commissioner. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10
ยง
761.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
